scenario.name: UAC smart cw тест. FC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "UAC smart cw тест. FC" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag_for_call_1] To: "[$cdpn1]" <sip:[$cdpn1]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
